Dining Gluten Free at Fast Food Restaurants: Chick-fil-a, Wendy's, and Sonic Drive-in mehpixielor , Yahoo! Contributor Network Jun 20, 2007 "Share your voice on Yahoo! websites. Start Here ." More: Dressing Chick Fil A Fast Food Breakfast Dipping Sauces Flag Close Coping with the physical, mental, and emotional damages of Celiac Disease is difficult enough; but what about the desire to eat a fast and convenient meal? Surprisingly many fast food joints offer a specialized menu catered to the gluten intolerant. The following is a list of three popular and well-known fast food restaurants and their gluten-free menu offerings. Remember: Be cautious while eating out and realize there is always a chance of cross contamination when other people are preparing your food!
Chick-fil-a's gluten-free menu as stated on their official Web site. http://www.chick-fil-a.com/gluten.asp
